Articles.Content:
For a spacecraft trying to land on a planet without atmosphere, how many force the game will simulate?

In real world, take a lunar lander as an example, we mainly consider the force given by rocket engine,  centripetal force, gravity and Coriolis force.  Will the game simulates all of these?

I've never seen signs of Coriolis force ingame, surely it has no effect when orbiting. I also guess, centripetal force is the same as gravity force.  So - momentum, thrust, weight, gravity acceleration, center of thrust (plus torque) and mass are computed, when no atmosphere is present. It simulates much more attributes, ofc, but they are not affecting landing.
